Welcome to Eduroam Connect’s documentation!¶

Eduroam Connect is a Python script to configurate Rasperry Pi or devices running on Linux to connect automatically with the Edoroam WiFi.

Please use the DOMAIN and TIMESERVER variables to set your specific domain for the eduroam verification and timeserver if nessesary.

  • Modifed Files

    • /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf
